text:
Adding Apache as NT Service ("Apache.exe -i -n foo") doesn't fill "description"
field. It gets filled only the first start ("net start foo"). I am using Apache
1.3.29 for Win32 on Windows XP Service Pack 1 with all the latest patches.
creator: dpnikolaenko@hotbox.ru

text:
That's correct, and the behavior is by design.

  Because folks add and yank modules from their installs, the feature list
  is updated upon server startup.

  IIRC the description field isn't filled in until the server is started,
  so that for -k install (-i) mode, we don't have a description available.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
